section.title: Search for Tax Authority
section.para: To search for a Tax Authority, select the "Search for Tax Authority" option. The following screen will appear:
When searching to retrieve Tax Authority information from the database, you are presented with the following options:

listitem.para: Enter any character or combination of characters you want to match, followed by the TAB key. The "Search for" field supports pattern matching with Regular Expressions.

tip.para: Hitting the TAB key activates the search operation.

listitem.para: Specify which of the following criteria you want to include in the search:
Select to search by Tax Authority code.
Select to search by Tax Authority Name.
Select to search by Tax Authority Street Address.
Select to search by Tax Authority City.
Select to search by Tax Authority State.
Select to search by Tax Authority Postal Code.
Select to search by Tax Authority Country.
Display will show search results for Tax Authorities, using specified parameters.
